tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: This means that the universe is singing the praises of God; that the reality which is revealed in the Quran, is testified to by the entire universe. In its silent language, it confirms this to the extent of singing praises
distractors: This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah At-Taghabun, Ayah 2?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Rejection of the Truth in spite of its being backed by reasoning made the doubters liable for punishment. The history made by the prophets in ancient times is an eternal source of admonition
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: People take the world to be a place of winning or losing (taghabun). In this world, however, success is as valueless as failure is
distractors: This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse discusses the creation of the universe

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah At-Taghabun, Ayah 10?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Every tribulation comes from God, and it afflicts man so that, through it, he should receive guidance. Trouble softens a man’s heart and jolts him out of his moral slumber
distractors: This verse narrates a historical event
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In another tradition it is mentioned that on the Day of Judgement a man will be brought before God, and it will be said of him that his wife and children ate away all his virtues
distractors: This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse narrates a historical event

tafsirQuiz.question: What deeper meaning is explained in this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The purpose of these limitations is that, till the last moment, the parties should have the opportunity for rapprochement, and the divorce should not create any disturbance in the family or society
distractors: This verse only discusses worldly matters
This verse focuses on scientific facts
This verse is primarily about historical events
